attributes.action: stop  companys  charging   you when  you use  a  credit or  debit  card
attributes.additional_details: Why  is  it  when  you pay  a  bill  or  book some  flights companys    charge  for using a   credit   or  debit  card  .some  companys   say  its  a  administration  charge and  some  just blame the  debit/credit   company   for  what   they  charge  and  they  are just  passing on the  charge  to  you  THERE  CUSTOMER.please  stop  this  giant  rip off  and  force our  mps  to help protect there  employers
